attributes.action: Admit that global warning is a fabrication of limited data.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Global warming is a direct result of solar activity, there were more greenhouse gasses in the atmosphere during carboniferous times. This is just a smokescreen to take our minds off the real major threat to civilisation. Excessive population.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
